message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $108?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
